requirement_designation: Humanities and Arts with Race & Ethnicity(*)
class_notes:
(Same as AAS 238 1)
The course examines the experiences of African Americans from the emergence of the transatlantic slave trade to the end of the Civil War.
course_description: The course examines the experiences of African Americans from the emergence of the transatlantic slave trade to the end of the Civil War. Emphasizes social and cultural history and interpretation of race, class, and gender.
sections: Class Nbr: 3647, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 1-2:15p, Instructor: C. Sanders, Status: Open
